casebody.data:
COMMISSIONER OF LABOR
v.
Weekley HOMES. No. 271P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 6, 2005. Thomas A. Farr, Phillip J. Strach, Bernhard Mueller, Cary, Robert E. Rader, Jr., Dallas, TX, for Weekley Homes. J. Michael Carpenter, for National Asso. Home Bldrs. et al. J. Nicholas Ellis, Rocky Mount, Julie W. Hampton, Raleigh, for NC Assoc. of Defense Attorneys. Phillip M. VanHoy, Charlotte, for NC Citizens for Business, et al. Richard M. Lewis, Raleigh, for Capital Associated Ind., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of June 2005 by Respondent to Amend Motion to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of June 2005."
